org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser

Interface PackageStateSerializer


  • public interface PackageStateSerializer
    Responsible for (de)serializing specified fields of PackageState.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deserialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state, InputStream in)
      Deserialize the stream or streams found in the input stream, and place the object form of each deserialized stream on the supplied state.
      void deserialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state, org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ser.StreamId streamId, InputStream in)
      Deserialize the specified stream from the input stream, and place the object form of the deserialized stream on the supplied state.
      void serialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state, OutputStream out)
      Serialize objects in the state to the output stream.
      void serialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state, org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ser.StreamId streamId, OutputStream out)
      Obtain the object specified by StreamId from the state and serialize it to the output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        void serialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state,
               OutputStream out)
        Serialize objects in the state to the output stream. Because the state normally contains multiple objects, multiple streams will be written to the output stream. How this occurs is implementation dependant.
        Parameters:
        state - the package state containing the streams to be serialized
        out - the output stream to serialize to

      • serialize

        void serialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state,
               org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ser.StreamId streamId,
               OutputStream out)
        Obtain the object specified by StreamId from the state and serialize it to the output stream. Because the state should only contain one object with the specified StreamId, a single stream will be written to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        state - the package state containing the stream identified by streamId
        streamId - the stream within the package state to serialize
        out - the output stream to serialize to

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state,
                 InputStream in)
        Deserialize the stream or streams found in the input stream, and place the object form of each deserialized stream on the supplied state.
        Parameters:
        state - the package state to be populated from the input stream, in
        in - the input stream containing the streams to be deserialized onto state

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageState state,
                 org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.ser.StreamId streamId,
                 InputStream in)
        Deserialize the specified stream from the input stream, and place the object form of the deserialized stream on the supplied state.
        Parameters:
        state - the package state to be populated from the input stream, in
        streamId - identifies an individual stream from the the input stream, in
        in - the input stream containing the identified stream to be deserialized onto state
